Review_title: My first question is: how can christians be in the government?
Review_Text: It is clear the EU is a bunch of incompetent, who possibly have no value.The documentary says nothing which wasn't obvious for me since 2010.The only thing it might have achieved is the clarity, that the EU, or like any civlized people and christianity have no common value. Can't have. We must get rid of religion, cancel it, or it'll cancel everyone else.History is the fight between civilization and religion.
